title: Social Mathematics Learning Strategies in Technology-Enhanced Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational secondary-level mathematics knowledge and basic digital device utilization skills
context.additional_context: Strengthening social learning through Web 2.0 tools (forums, collaborative documents, mobile quizzes) in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners achieve an 80%+ interaction participation rate by sharing mathematical problem-solving processes with peers using LMS collaboration tools
Learners form a 75%+ understanding of weekly learning content through a mobile-optimized quiz system
Learners complete math project reports with at least three peer feedback iterations using web-based collaborative documents (e.g., Google Docs)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
